price: ហើយមនុស្សលោកភាគច្រើនគ្មានជំនឿឡើយ សូម្បីតែ អ្នកបានព្យាយាម(ពន្យល់)យ៉ាងណាក៏ដោយ។
arabic: وَمَآ أَكۡثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَوۡ حَرَصۡتَ بِمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wamā aktharu al-nāsi walaw ḥaraṣta bimu'minīna
